title: This trader predicted the bond meltdown, tech selloff and oil's surge. Here's what she says is coming next. - MarketWatch
content: This trader predicted the bond meltdown, tech selloff and oil's surge. Here's what she says is coming next.  MarketWatch
description: Our call of the day comes from Samantha LaDuc, who says the market is wrong if it thinks inflation is going to cool off.
